name: Over and Over
description:
To play just unzip the file and execute "Over and Over.exe"

"Over and Over" is a short skill-based platformer set in only one room with only one simple task to compleate over and over

Even though it's possible to keep playing and reach the end even after dieing the true ending is only achieved by playing the entire game from start to finish without dieing (pressing R will reset you at the begginning if you want to try again, alternatively you can enable hard mode in the settings and by doing so every time you die the game will be automatically reset to the beginning)

The entire game has been made solo, including art, sound effects and music. 

If you're intereasted in following me, i just created a new youtube channel where i'll upload devlogs of my main project as soon as i will feel like it's good enough to be revealed to the world

My personal best score is only 7 out of 22, can you beat it?
